Show all photos

Duration: 48 hours

Service animals welcome

Enjoy a 2-day Frankfurt Card while visiting Frankfurt, the city at the river Main. This is the perfect way for Frankfurt visitors to take advantage of the city's well-developed public transportation system as well as enjoying reduced-price admission to numerous cultural attractions and discounts on other services throughout the Main metropolis during two consecutive days.

You'll receive your valid ticket directly upon order via e-mail. All you need is a printer and Din A4 format paper. Print your card at home and use it right away for your journey to Frankfurt, e.g., when arriving via Frankfurt Airport.

For further information visit our Tourist Information Office Römer (Römerberg 27, 60311 Frankfurt/Main; Mon-Sat 9 am- 6 pm, Sun 9 am - 4 pm)

## What's included

- Frankfurt 2-day city pass
- Free and unlimited travel on Frankfurt's public transport system within the city districts and Frankfurt International Airport (Zone 50 and 5090)
- Various discounts at all Frankfurt Card partners: www.visitfrankfurt.travel/citycard

## What's Not Included

What's not included

- Tickets cannot be used digitally
- Travel on long-distance trains (IC, ICE) requires separate tickets

### Additional information

Wheelchair accessible

Infants and small children can ride in a pram or stroller

Service animals allowed

Public transportation options are available nearby

Transportation options are wheelchair accessible

### Frequently asked questions

#### How do I book a ticket?

- Select a date and time.

- Choose the number of tickets.

- Click to the next page and enter your personal details.

- After entering your personal details, select your payment method and enter your payment details.

- Once you’ve entered your payment details, you’ll be redirected to the ticket page where you can check the status and details of your reservations.

- You'll receive a confirmation email once the reservation is confirmed with the attraction operator. This could take some time depending on the supplier.

- You can view your tickets in the confirmation email or in the Bookings & Trips section of your account.


* * *

#### When do I pay?

Booking.com collects payment on behalf of the attraction operator when you book your ticket.

* * *

#### How do digital tickets work?

Each digital ticket contains a unique code. This is usually a QR or numerical code, but could be something else and can be found on your ticket or the PDF sent to you.

If your digital ticket contains a barcode or QR code, show it to the staff at the attraction's entrance or ticket collection point for them to scan.

For those with numerical codes, show your ticket to staff for verification.

* * *

#### Can I cancel or modify my tickets?

Once you book your tickets for this attraction, you won’t be able to modify or cancel the reservation.

metadata.title: Frankfurt Card 2 Days Frankfurt – Booking.com
metadata.description: Find out about Frankfurt Card 2 Days like business hours, location, and events. Book tickets online with free cancellation and skip-the-line access!

Why visit: Enjoy significant discounts at museums and cultural attractions
Free and unlimited travel on public transport within Frankfurt
Convenient access to explore Frankfurt and nearby Mainz easily
What included: Free and unlimited travel on Frankfurt's public transport system
Various discounts at all Frankfurt Card partners
What not included: Travel on long-distance trains (IC, ICE) requires separate tickets
Restrictions: Infants and small children can ride in a pram or stroller
Location: Frankfurt Tourist Information Romer, Roemerberg 27, Frankfurt Hesse, 60311
additional Information: Digital tickets contain unique codes for access
No modification or cancellation of tickets after booking
